review: I recently got my dental implant treatment done at DentAvenue Dental Clinic and I must say that the entire experience was top-notch. The staff was friendly and professional and the procedure was painless. Highly recommended this dental clinic in Chembur!
I had a fantastic experience at Dr. Akshay's DentAvenue Dental Clinic. The staff was welcoming, and the clinic was clean and modern.
Impressed with their overdenture service; comfortable and well-fitted. The clinic's ambiance is pleasant and comforting, making the entire experience stress-free.
They did not confirm prior about the xray charges , also xray or any other supporting document was not provided even after paying the xray charges .
Professional dental implants procedure; feeling more confident with my new tooth.                    .

Dr. Akshay is very prompt and amazing in his work. He is very polite and makes sure that you are at complete ease
I visited him to get my dental implants done. I must say he did a perfect job. He is the best in his field.
